fields.Body:
Arabella’s Castle is located in Queens. It’s a boutique banquet hall available for rental for any special events and occasions.

Our beautiful and elegant hall is spacious and provides a very warm and inviting atmosphere at a very affordable budget.The exquisite setting is sure to leave your guests impressed.We’re conveniently located in the heart of Queens, easily accessible to all highways: Long Island Expressway, Belt Parkway, Brooklyn Queens Expressway, Jackie Robinson Parkway and Van Wyck Expressway. Consider Arabella’s Castle for your next event or occasions. The perfect hall for an intimate setting to share and make memories with your friends and family.
Events: Baby Shower, Weddings, Baptism, Bridal Showers, Birthdays, Sweet Sixteen, Quinceaneras, Office Party, Social Events, Henna Party, Engagement Party, Family Events, Funerals, Christmas Party, New Year’s Eve Party, etc….We offer different packages to fit any budget, call us at 888-280-8108 to schedule an appoint to visit Arabella’s Castle.
fields.Title: Welcome to Arabella’s Castle.
